q: Windows tablets- a`` slew of them''- will be unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer at the 2011 Consumer Electronics Show, according to an article today in the New York Times. Citing people familiar with Microsoft's plans, the Times reports that several manufacturers have signed up to build Windows tablets, including Dell and Samsung. , in his resignation statement, insisted he stood by his previous line that he was not aware of phone hacking when he was News of the World editor and said he had done nothing wrong. His resignation follows months of accusations that he had been aware of and sanctioned widespread phone hacking during the period of his editorship of the paper.
